page.title: 15School & Community College
page.content: Burford School was founded in 1571 by Simon Wisdom as a Grammar School,and has gone through many changes.Now in 1985 it is a large comprehensive school with 1167 pupils coming from several surrounding villages as well as Burford itself.The school is particularly noted for the agriculturaln courses offered. During the curricular year the school was presented with the Education for Capability award in recognition of the reporting system which leads to every pupil receiving the Burford Certificate on leaving school.The school serves the adult community as well and received the Society of Education Officers award for the development of curriculum of the School at the heart of the community.
